pull.title: refactor: Make SetupServerArgs callable without NodeContext
pull.body:
`bitcoin-gui` code needs to call `SetupServerArgs` but will not have a `NodeContext` object if it is communicating with an external `bitcoin-node` process, so this just passes `ArgsManager` directly.

---

This PR is part of the [process separation project](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/projects/10). The commit was first part of larger PR #10102.

events.message:
Make SetupServerArgs callable without NodeContext

bitcoin-gui code needs to call SetupServerArgs but will not have a
NodeContext object if it is communicating with an external bitcoin-node
process.

issue.title: multiprocess: Start using init makeNode, makeChain, etc methods
issue.body:
Use `interfaces::Init::make*` methods instead of `interfaces::Make*` functions, so interfaces can be constructed differently in different executable without having to change any code. (So for example `bitcoin-gui` can make an `interfaces::Node` pointer that communicates with a `bitcoin-node` subprocess, while `bitcoin-qt` can make an `interfaces::Node` pointer that controls node code in the same process.)

---

This PR is part of the [process separation project](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/projects/10). The commit was first part of larger PR #10102.

events.body:
UPDATE:  not only Windows -- #22227.

This PR causes a failed assertion on Windows 10 Pro (20H2, build 19042.1052):

![Screenshot from 2021-06-11 22-13-26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/121738688-389bb100-cb03-11eb-8c76-c7c4d42e7720.png)

issue.title: Regression in #22216
issue.body:
The recently merged #22216 causes a failed assertion:

```
$ src/qt/bitcoin-qt -signet
bitcoin-qt: wallet/init.cpp:127: auto WalletInit::Construct(NodeContext &)::(anonymous class)::operator()() const: Assertion `"node.args" && check' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
```

events.body:
Oh, sorry, I'm able to reproduce. Looking into it.

Stack trace at f66eceaecf464bfab5e19f3ca8fe680d8a6aa2e1

```
#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff3be8921 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79
#2  0x00007ffff3bd848a in __assert_fail_base (fmt=0x7ffff3d5f750 "%s%s%s:%u: %s%sAssertion `%s' failed.\n%n", 
    assertion=assertion@entry=0x55555696d12f "\"node.args\" && check", file=file@entry=0x5555569afca6 "wallet/init.cpp", line=line@entry=127, 
    function=function@entry=0x5555569afe34 "auto WalletInit::Construct(NodeContext &)::(anonymous class)::operator()() const") at assert.c:92
#3  0x00007ffff3bd8502 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x55555696d12f "\"node.args\" && check", file=0x5555569afca6 "wallet/init.cpp", 
    line=127, function=0x5555569afe34 "auto WalletInit::Construct(NodeContext &)::(anonymous class)::operator()() const") at assert.c:101
#4  0x0000555555f4f15a in WalletInit::Construct(NodeContext&) const::$_0::operator()() const (this=0x7fffffffce80) at wallet/init.cpp:127
#5  0x0000555555f4ee4a in WalletInit::Construct (this=0x55555704b660 <_ZGR23g_wallet_init_interface_>, node=...) at wallet/init.cpp:127
#6  0x0000555555a0b54b in AppInitInterfaces (node=...) at init.cpp:1058
#7  0x0000555555bb67f5 in node::(anonymous namespace)::NodeImpl::baseInitialize (this=0x555557087950) at node/interfaces.cpp:81
#8  0x0000555555797256 in BitcoinApplication::baseInitialize (this=0x7fffffffd400) at qt/bitcoin.cpp:289
#9  0x000055555579abef in GuiMain (argc=2, argv=0x7fffffffdc18) at qt/bitcoin.cpp:633
#10 0x00005555557916bf in main (argc=2, argv=0x7fffffffdc18) at qt/main.cpp:21
```

issue.title: Fix gui segfault caused by bitcoin/bitcoin#22216
issue.body:
Reported by Hennadii Stepanov https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22216#issuecomment-859790682

Fixes bitcoin/bitcoin#22227
